text: All necessary services for combatants and family members of the fallen: City Veterans Center opened in Brovary (video) [Exclusive](/en/news/lawyer-sbi-investigators-in-the-case-of-nbu-chief-lawyer-zyma-can-be-held-liable-for-failure-to-comply-with-court-order) Lawyer: SBI investigators in the case of NBU Chief Lawyer Zyma can be held liable for failure to comply with court order [Exclusive](/en/news/is-there-any-punishment-for-illegal-prosecution-in-ukraine-sapo-comments-on-acquittal-of-ex-minister-omelyan) Is there any punishment for illegal prosecution in Ukraine - SAPO comments on acquittal of ex-Minister Omelyan [Exclusive](/en/news/state-owned-banks-impose-stricter-conditions-on-business-for-loan-restructuring-than-commercial-banks-expert) State-owned banks impose stricter conditions on business for loan restructuring than commercial banks - expert [Exclusive](/en/news/individual-approach-and-no-bureaucracy-mp-on-how-to-solve-the-problems-of-veterans-of-the-russian-ukrainian-war-on-the-ground) Individual approach and no bureaucracy - MP on how to solve the problems of veterans of the Russian-Ukrainian war on the ground [Exclusive](/en/news/foreign-experts-can-play-an-important-role-in-the-transparency-of-the-competition-for-the-head-of-the-deposit-guarantee-fund-political-expert) Foreign experts can play an important role in the transparency of the competition for the head of the Deposit Guarantee Fund - political expert [Exclusive](/en/news/manipulations-at-rehabilitation-people-of-fugitive-ex-minister-klymenko-are-trying-to-seize-gulliver-under-the-guise-of-patriotism) Manipulations at rehabilitation: people of fugitive ex-minister Klymenko are trying to seize Gulliver under the guise of patriotism [Exclusive](/en/news/arrangement-of-modern-and-reliable-shelters-in-schools-and-kindergartens-is-the-main-focus-of-preparation-for-the-new-school-year-brovary-mayor-ihor-sapozhko) Arrangement of modern and reliable shelters in schools and kindergartens is the main focus of preparation for the new school year - Brovary Mayor [Exclusive](/en/news/lawyer-business-loan-restructuring-helps-to-avoid-default-and-work-to-maintain-economic-stability-of-the-country) Lawyer: Business loan restructuring helps to avoid default and work to maintain economic stability of the country [Exclusive](/en/news/mp-armas-use-of-cars-with-cover-plates-is-grounds-for-internal-investigation) MP: ARMA's use of cars with cover plates is grounds for internal investigation Popular Putin personally voiced a fake about Ukraine's alleged attempts to strike at the Kursk nuclear power plant. NSDC explains motives Umerov discusses Ukraine's defense needs with the Deputy Chief of the British Defense Staff Work on the implementation of the Peace Formula has begun: Yermak held an international conference on Ukraine's energy security No blackouts are expected in the near future: YASNO tells about the situation in the energy sector amid the abnormal heat To expel the occupier from Ukraine, it is necessary to create as many problems as possible for the Russian state on its territory - Zelenskyy Publications Is there any punishment for illegal prosecution in Ukraine - SAPO comments on acquittal of ex-Minister Omelyan Is there any punishment for illegal prosecution in Ukraine - SAPO comments on acquittal of ex-Minister OmelyanExclusive Manipulations at rehabilitation: people of fugitive ex-minister Klymenko are trying to seize Gulliver under the guise of patriotism Manipulations at rehabilitation: people of fugitive ex-minister Klymenko are trying to seize Gulliver under the guise of patriotismExclusive NABU detectives ignored interrogation of defense witnesses in ex-Minister Solskyi case - lawyers appeal to HACC Support for Veterans of the Russian-Ukrainian War: Experience of Small Communities
